caption.p: Additional file 3: Figure S1. Correlation between change in transcript expression level and change in DAS28 score in good responders for the top 10 differentially expressed transcripts according to p-value. Figure S2. Correlation between change in transcript expression level and change in swollen joint count (SJC) in good responders for the top 10 differentially expressed transcripts according to p-value. Figure S3. Correlation between change in transcript expression level and change in tender joint count (TJC) in good responders for the top 10 differentially expressed transcripts according to p-value. Figure S4. Correlation between change in transcript expression level and change in C-reactive protein (CRP) levels in good responders for the top 10 differentially expressed transcripts according to p-value.
